title: BREAKING Ripple News: XRP Not a Security, Price Skyrockets 30% to $0.56 – Will It Hit $10 by Year’s End?
description: US District Judge Analisa Torres concludes the long-standing legal dispute by officially ruling that Ripple’s XRP is not a security. This landmark ruling could potentially have far-reaching implications on the crypto industry as the SEC has been implementing an enforcement-first approach to digital asset regulation.
